GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: Fix races among concurrent prealloc proc writes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.32 by commit 51fce708ab8986a9879ee5da946a2cc120f1036d. For more details please see the references link.
